abstract: borussia dortmund hint at aubameyang exit .
article: borussia dortmund chief michael zorc has suggested pierre-emerick aubameyang may leave this month after growing disillusioned by his behaviour this season . aubameyang was dropped from dortmund 's squad for sunday 's 0-0 draw with wolfsburg after being disciplined by the club for the third time in less than 12 months . the gabon international failed to turn up for a team meeting in midweek and was subsequently replaced in the starting xi by 18-year-old alexander isak against wolfsburg . `` at some point you ca n't tolerate it any more , '' the daily mirror quote zorc as saying after the match .

`` i do n't know what 's going on inside his head . we had a very contentious discussion today . we 're not used to this behaviour from him . `` what is going on now is not to be tolerated by the club . it is clear : it can not go on like this . i do n't know what is going through his mind . i do n't recognise him anymore . `` there is trouble in the team and that is not good . '' despite off field troubles , aubameyang has still be at his goalscoring best this season .
only robert lewandowski has scored more bundesliga goals than aubameyang this season .
